abstract: CNN’s two-part special “Planet in Peril” attracted an average of 1.4 million viewers earlier this week, giving the cable news network a big boost in the ratings from 9 to 11 p.m. on Tuesday and Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: CNN’s two-part special “Planet in Peril” attracted an average of 1.4 million viewers earlier this week, giving the cable news network a big boost in the ratings from 9 to 11 p.m. on Tuesday and Wednesday.
